brief_title: Study Evaluating Sirolimus in End Stage Renal Disease in High Risk Kidney Transplant Recipients
brief_summary: The incidence of efficacy failure at 12 months between two regimens.
criteria: Inclusion Criteria - Age: 13 years or older, 40 kgs or more - End-stage renal disease - African-American/Black transplant recipient and/or repeat renal transplant recipient who lost a previous allograft Exclusion Criteria - Evidence of active infection - Evidence abnormal chest x-ray - Patients with HIV.
